pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Medium Carnivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Aggressive $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Cold Biomes $(br2)$(l)Gender Dimorphism:$() $(br)Bigger Males

The Direwolf is a medium-sized, swift, pack-hunting carnivore. Direwolves can be tamed with raw meats or eggs, and can be saddled and ridden. While they don't follow their owner, they can be sat down. They come in many different color-marking combinations.
